comment: Send me a source that is not an advocacy organization and I will look at it . And I will look for one myself . Children are not dying en masse on cold floors . It is not happening I can guarantee you . I'll bet you a cheeseburger .
amr:
# ::snt Send me a source that is not an advocacy organization and I will look at it . And I will look for one myself . Children are not dying en masse on cold floors . It is not happening I can guarantee you . I'll bet you a cheeseburger .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / send-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (s2 / source
                        :ARG0-of (a2 / advocate-01
                              :polarity -))
                  :ARG2 (ii / i))
            :op2 (l / look-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 s2))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (l2 / look-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 s2)
            :op2 (l3 / look-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 s2))
      :snt3 (d / die-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c / child)
            :manner (e / en)
            :location (f / floor
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / cold-01)))
      :snt4 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (g / guarantee-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (c3 / cheeseburger)
                  :ARG2 (y2 / you)))
      :snt5 p
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 g
      :ARG0 ii3
      :ARG1 (ii4 / it)
      :ARG2 y2)

comment: Now you say they are not dying " an masse " . How many do you want - ? ? , ? The fatality numbers are from the CPB , hardly an advocacy group .
amr:
# ::snt Now you say they are not dying " an masse " . How many do you want - ? ? , ? The fatality numbers are from the CPB , hardly an advocacy group .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (d / die-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (t / they)
                  :manner (m2 / masse))
            :time (n / now))
      :snt2 (w / want-01
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt3 (n2 / number
            :quant-of (f / fatality)
            :source (o / organization
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Conservative"
                        :op2 "Political"
                        :op3 "Budget"
                        :op4 "Budget"
                        :op5 "Budget")
                  :ARG1-of (m3 / mean-01
                        :ARG2 (g / group
                              :ARG0-of (a2 / advocate-01)
                              :mod (h / hardly))))))
